name: Anteater Highway
description:
NOTE: For the best experience download and play the windows build. Due to unity issues with the web build version cannot play the credits or how to play video. 




Sosig Studios is a group of 3rd year students studying at Abertay University. We are:

Ross Gauld - Producer/Team Lead/Sound Designer
Twitter: https://twitter.com/roseygoold

Twitter: https://twitter.com/DanielTolland
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/daniel-tolland-a19509218/ 

Josh Heron - Gameplay/Level Designer
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ForgingFoxes

Cameron Thustain - UX/Gameplay/Audio Programmer/Level Designer
Twitter: https://twitter.com/tboyftw_
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/cameron-thustain-3739a81a6/

Joseph Roper - UX/Gameplay Programmer/System Administrator
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/joseph-roper-753632183

Special Thanks

Robin Griffiths

Lizzie Seymour

Amy Cox

Alana McDowall

Kieran MacKinley

Additional sound effects were sourced from https://www.zapsplat.com/

Additional code was provided by SpeedTutor (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwYuQIa9lgjvDiZryUVtFGw)

This project was developed over 14 weeks for the module DES310: Professional Project. 

Anteater Highway is a prototype and is downloadable on windows or can be played in browser.
